name: projekt-5
description: This web app was developed as a part of Fifth Project for [Advanced Web Development](https://www.fer.unizg.hr/en/course/awd) @ FER

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-files && prisma generate && echo "Build complete!"
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist/ && cp -r src/views/ dist/views/ && cp -r src/styles/ dist/styles/
